data.actual_result: The join server button shows but there is also an embed below it
data.expected_result: The join server button would show and the embed would not show
data.short_description: Bolded invite links cause an embed to show as well as the join server button
data.steps_to_repro: - Obtain an invite link (for example <discord.gg/testers>) - Send the invite link like this (include \*s for bold) \*\*<https://discord.gg/testers>\*\* - Observe the added embed
